did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Residential Child Care Project records, 1981-1997.
did.physdesc: Correspondence, reports, training manuals, brochures, and symposium material.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, reports, training manuals, brochures, and symposium material concerning the Residential Child Care Project in the Family Life Development Center at Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, reports, training manuals, brochures, and symposium material concerning the Residential Child Care Project in the Family Life Development Center at Cornell University.
